content: **sizes ** xs - s/m - m/l - xl - xxl **finished measurements ** bust 74-86-92-102-114 cm 29 1/8 - 33 7/8 - 36 25 - 40 1/8 - 44 7/8 hem 62-74-80-92-102 cm 24 3/8 - 29 1/8 - 31 5 - 36 25 - 40 1/8 the measurements seem a little small but the garment will be very stretchy so make your usual size **additional gauge information ** double_crochet 14 double_crochet wide with 1 chain between each and 14 row = 10 x 10 cm drops design 81-22 contains a pattern for both a cardigan and a tank top think twin set the above information is for the top click for pattern information for the cardigan 1 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/81-22-a-crocheted-cardigan
